Name: Kings0
About the game: Kings0 is a turn-based strategy in medieval genre , where you have to manage your civilization in many aspects of the game with the help of a certain set of game mechanics. You will be able to visit different and sometimes completely unpredictable situations, where your victory will depend indirectly on the way you play. Economy, pumping and construction, diplomacy, battles with lords, bandits and other civilizations, raids and robberies, achievements and easter eggs and much more you can experience here.
Meta Title: Kings0: Feb 10, 2022, RAD Team and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Kings0? Check out the release date (Feb 10, 2022), developer insights from RAD Team, and a complete game summary.
